workshoptitle: Migrate Your Monolith to Microservices in Minutes Using The Data Refactoring Advisor

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Collect details of the application using SQL Tuning Sets
Lab 3: Determine the affinity between tables
Lab 4: Construct a graph using the collected data
Lab 5: Extract the smaller graph from the bigger graph
Lab 6: Run the community detection algorithm
Lab 7: Analyze the sub-graphs and adjust constraints
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
